title: WraptorSkinz Skin Compatible with Sony PS4 Dualshock Controller Playstation 4 Original Slim and Pro Painted Faded and Cracked Red Line USA American Flag (Controller NOT Included)
features: PS4 Controller Professional Grade Skin - Fits all PlayStation 4 Ogirinal, Slim and Pro controllers.
Covers front and side of PS4 Controller. Back is not covered.
Premium vinyl covered with glossy protective laminate top layer. Thin and strong, does not effect game play.
Made in the USA by WraptorSkinz
description: WraptorSkinz are self adhering vinyl skins that help prevent scratches and look great doing it. Unlike bulky silicon, plastic or metal cases and faceplates, WraptorSkinz are designed to be thin and very tough. WraptorSkinz are a composite of two layers of commercial grade materials. The bottom layer is a soft, flexible vinyl with a special removable adhesive that is easily positioned, applied without air bubbles. Next we print the bottom layer with UV protected, fade resistant inks that deliver superb photo quality designs in vibrant colors. Finally we bond a professional grade laminate over the entire skin adding a glossy protective finish.
